Control Name: 5.1.1 Ensure that anti-virus programs are capable of detecting, removing, and protecting against all known types of malicious software.

control_attributes.Control: 5.1.1 Ensure that anti-virus programs are capable of detecting, removing, and protecting against all known types of malicious software.
control_attributes.Requirement: Requirement 5. Protect all systems against malware and regularly update anti-virus software or programs
